gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all notification schemes to understand how notifications are configured across different projects.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all notification schemes available in the Jira instance.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to create a new notification scheme to customize notifications for a new project.
gold.ideal: Creates a new notification scheme and returns the details of the created scheme.

gold.user: As a developer, I need to see which notification schemes are mapped to specific projects to ensure proper notification delivery.
gold.ideal: Returns a mapping of notification schemes to projects.

gold.user: As a team lead, I want to view the details of a specific notification scheme to review its configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified notification scheme.

gold.user: As a project administrator, I need to update an existing notification scheme to include new notification types.

gold.user: As a project manager, I want to add notifications to an existing scheme to ensure team members are informed of important updates.
